title: #HOTTAB
description: #HOTTAB is an easy-to-use, multilingual, food discovery and ordering app that offers a diverse range of cuisines, daily promotions and special loyalty programs that will bring a world of possibility to your fingertips.

TOAST.appSignupFail: Sorry, we can not create your account. Please try again later.
TOAST.updateCustomer: Sorry we can not update your information. Please try again.
TOAST.restaurantGetOutlets: Sorry, we can not retrieve data now. Please refresh the page.
TOAST.Request_OTP_OK: Verification code for your phone number has been sent successfully!!!
TOAST.ClaimVoucherSuccessfully: Congratulations! Now you can use %s to pay at %s for your next order on #HOTTAB.

LABEL.API_TIMEOUT: Sorry, your session has expired. Please log in again.
LABEL.PAGE_NOT_EXIST: Sorry, the page you were looking for doesn't exist anymore.
LABEL.NO_LOCATION_DATA: Sorry , #HOTTAB is not available in your area. Please choose another location to discover more options.
LABEL.OPTION_IS_MANDATORY: This option is mandatory. Please fill it in.
LABEL.CONFIRM_REMOVE_ORDER: Do you want to clear the current order?
LABEL.CONFIRM_REMOVE_CART_ITEM: Do you want to remove this item from your cart?
LABEL.NAME: Name
LABEL.Supplier can not delive on time: Supplier can not deliver on time
LABEL.Yay!! Your order is in process now!: Yay!! Your order is being processed now!
LABEL.Yay!! Your order is in refund process no: Yay!! Your order is being refunded now!
LABEL.The event %@ will start soon %@ at %@: The event %@ will start soon at %@ at %@
LABEL.VOUCHER_CLAIM_1: Yay! You have just received a voucher valued at %@ of %#.
LABEL.VOUCHER_CLAIM_2: Claim to use it on your next order.
LABEL.VOUCHER_INFO_1: Voucher will apply to %@% of subtotal of order.
LABEL.VOUCHER_INFO_2: You can share this voucher to %@ additional friends.
LABEL.VOUCHER_INFO_3: Vouchers are automatically placed into your cart. No need to type anything to apply.
LABEL.VOUCHER_HINT: Share some love with your friends and loved ones. When you share the vouchers, you get to keep yours and your loved ones get a copy.
LABEL.VOUCHER_MSG1: Share some love with your friends and loved ones
LABEL.VOUCHER_MSG2: When you share the vouchers, you get to keep yours and your loved ones get a copy.
LABEL.new_rewarded_voucher: Yay!! You have just received a voucher valued at %@ from order number %# from %$.
LABEL.new_shared_voucher: Yay! You have just received a voucher valued at %@ from %# by sharing. Place an order to use it now.
LABEL.OTP_SEND_MESSAGE: We have sent a code to your phone to verify your phone number. Please enter the code.
LABEL.reminder_new_order_first: Your order hasn't been confirmed yet. %@ %# might be a bit busy.
LABEL.reminder_new_order_second: Sorry, you must be hungry. Your order to %@ %# has not been confirmed yet. Do you want to call them at %$ or cancel your order?
LABEL.notification_order_cancelled: Sorry, your order from %@ has been cancelled. Please make another order!
LABEL.reminder_not_on_the_way: It's been a while, perhaps %@ forgot to mention your delivery is on the way. You could try calling them at %# to check on your order.
LABEL.notification_vouchers_cancelled: Your order was cancelled but don't worry, your voucher is safe back to you: %@
LABEL.DETAIL_VOUCHER_MESSAGE: Order now and get back %s% for delivery and %s% for take away
LABEL.DETAIL_VOUCHER_MESSAGE_DELIVERY: Order now and get %s% back for delivery
LABEL.DETAIL_VOUCHER_MESSAGE_TAKE_AWAY: Order now and get %s% back for take away
LABEL.VERIFYING_MESSAGE: We've sent the code to %@. Please enter it below to check out
LABEL.VOUCHER_DETAIL_MSG2: Encourage your friends to claim to earn more.
LABEL.NO_RESULT_LOCATION:
Sorry, we are not available on your area now.
Please choose another location to discover.
LABEL.FEEDBACK_CONFIRM: Your feedback is %s. Do you want to submit?
LABEL.CART_NO_DELIVERY: HOTTAB is not responsible for delivery and making order. %s will deliver this order to you.

notification.notify_your_order_is_in_process_now: Yay ! Your order %s from %s is in process now!
notification.notify_order_is_being_delivered: Your order %s from %s is being delivered.
notification.notify_order_has_been_delivered: Your order %s from %s has been delivered. Are you ready to enjoy?
notification.notify_order_has_been_paid: Your order %s from %s has been paid. Thanks for using our service!
notification.notify_order_has_been_canceled: Oops, Your order %s has been cancelled by %s because %s.
notification.new_rewarded_voucher: You have just received voucher value %s by order number %s from %s. Please check your user profile for more information.
notification.new_shared_voucher: Yay! You have just received a voucher valued %s from %s by sharing. Place an order to use it now.
notification.new_friend_claimed: Your friend with phone number %s has just claimed your voucher.
notification.new_friend_claimed_full: Your friend with phone number %s has just claimed your voucher. You get back %s. Convert it to voucher to use!
notification.reminder_new_order_first: Your order hasn't been confirmed yet. %s might be a bit busy.
notification.reminder_new_order_second: Sorry, you must be hungry. Your order to %s has not been confirmed yet. Do you want to call them at %s or cancel your order?

VALIDATE.SEND_OTP_TO_PHONE_NUMBER: We will send you a verification code to your number {{phone}}
VALIDATE.ENTER_PHONE: Phone Number has not been entered.
VALIDATE.ENTER_FULLNAME: Your name has not been entered.
VALIDATE.ENTER_ADDRESS: Delivery address has not been entered.
VALIDATE.ENTER_OTP: Verification code has not been entered.
VALIDATE.CART_WRONG_OPEN_TIME: Sorry, this restaurant is currently closed.
VALIDATE.CART_WRONG_ORDER_TIME: Sorry, this ordering method is currently not available.
VALIDATE.CART_PHONE: You need to verify your phone number first
VALIDATE.CART_DISTANCE_TOO_FAR: Your distance exceeds the maximum delivery range. Please choose a closer delivery address or change the ordering method.
VALIDATE.CART_PRICE_TOO_LOW: You haven't reached the minimum order amount for delivery. Please add more items to your cart.
VALIDATE.CART_PRICE_TOO_HIGH: Your order exceeded the maximum order amount for delivery. Please remove items from your cart.
VALIDATE.ENTER_VERIFICATION_CODE: This code is incorrect, please enter a different verification code.
VALIDATE.CART_DISTANCE_CANT_GET_DIRECTION: The map does not recognise the location. Please change your delivery address.
VALIDATE.NOT_DETERMINE_ROUTE: The map can not get the directions
VALIDATE.CAN_NOT_LOCATE_BUSINESS: Can not locate the address of the business
VALIDATE.SUSPEND_METHOD: Sorry for inconvenience, this restaurant is currently too busy. Please come back later!
VALIDATE.DATE_OF_BIRTH_NOT_VALID: Date of birth is not valid.

ERROR_CODE.token_expired_rule_error: Session has expired, please log out then log in again.
ERROR_CODE.token_is_required_rule_error: Token is required, please log in.
ERROR_CODE.user_not_verify_yet_need_otp_rule_error: You're not verified yet, please enter the verification code
ERROR_CODE.can_not_verify_the_phone_with_the_code_r: Verification code is invalid. Please enter it again.
ERROR_CODE.can_not_send_opt_rule_error: We can't send the verification code to your number. Your number may not be registered yet.
ERROR_CODE.in_valid_phone_or_country_code_rule_erro: The phone/country code that you've entered is incorrect. Please try again.
ERROR_CODE.invalid_phone_or_verification_code_rule_: Phone or verification code is invalid. Please enter it again.
ERROR_CODE.invalid_phone_or_verification_code_time_: Verification code is invalid. Please enter it again. You have only {{verification_time}} time(s) left.
ERROR_CODE.otp_would_be_active_less_than_5_times_ru: You only had 5 attempts to enter the Verification Code. Please enter another phone number to continue.
ERROR_CODE.Failed to fetch: There was problem communicating with the servers. Please refresh the page.
ERROR_CODE.Network Error: There was problem communicating with the servers. Please refresh the page.
ERROR_CODE.NetworkError when attempting to fetch re: Network Error when attempting to fetch resource.
ERROR_CODE.Request failed with status code 400: There was problem communicating with the servers. Please try again later.
ERROR_CODE.Request failed with status code 500: There was problem communicating with the servers. Please try again later.
ERROR_CODE.The date for registration closed: The date for registration has closed
ERROR_CODE.used_or_expired_rule_error: The voucher valued at %@ has expired. Please use another voucher.
ERROR_CODE.used_or_expired_rule_error_2: The vouchers valued at %@ have expired. Please use another voucher.
ERROR_CODE.the_restaurant_current_not_support_deliv: Sorry for inconvenience, this restaurant is currently too busy. Please come back later!

ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.you_are_unauthorized: You are not authorised, please log in
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.operation_failed_verify_phone: Verification code is invalid. Please enter it again.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.unknow_error_verify_phone: There's something wrong. Please change number and try again.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.unknow_error: There's something wrong. Sorry for the inconvenience.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.confirm_cart_error_token_absent: Can not place an order. Please verify your phone number.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.you_have_time_for_resend_otp: You have to wait 30 seconds to send verification again. Sorry for the inconvenience
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.REFRESH_TOKEN: Your session has expired. Please wait to refresh your session.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.CAN_NOT_REFRESH_TOKEN: Sorry we can not refresh your session. Please log out and log in again.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.REFRESH_TOKEN_LOGOUT: Sorry we can not refresh your session. You will be logged out of the system.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.VOUCHER_AMOUNT_EXCEEDED: Sorry, you can not apply voucher for more than %@% of the subtotal amount of order.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.VOUCHER_NUMBER_EXCEEDED: Sorry, you can not use multiple voucher for this restaurant.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.VOUCHER_MIX: Sorry, you can not use collected voucher and shared voucher at the same time.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.voucher_already_claimed_rule_error: You have already claimed this voucher.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.voucher_reached_share_limit_rule_error: Sorry, this voucher is available for %@ persons only. Please make an order or try another shared link to claim the voucher.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.voucher_claim_owned_rule_error: Can not claim your own voucher.
ERROR_CUSTOM_CODE.voucher_cannot_be_shared_rule_error: This voucher can not be shared.

PRIVACY.Para1: This Privacy Policy (the "Policy") describes how Hottab Vietnam Company Limited ("HOTTAB", "us", "we", or "our") collects, uses, discloses and protects your Data as defined below. Please read this Policy and understand it before using our Website/Application. By signing up the Website: https://hottab.co/ (the "Website") and/or using HOTTAB's Mobile application for consumers (the "Application"), which are supplied by HOTTAB or dealing with a merchant using the Application, you are agreeing to the terms of this Policy and Terms of Use which is also posted on the Website.
PRIVACY.Para3: This Policy applies to everyone who signs up the Website or uses the Application and does not apply to any third-party websites, services or applications, even if they are accessible through the Website. You linking to a third-party website, service or application is entirely at your own risk and subject to the terms and conditions of such website, service or application.
PRIVACY.Para4: 2. Collection of the Personal and Non-personal Data ("Data")
PRIVACY.Para6: "Personal Data" means any information that can be used to contact or identify you, including but not limited to name, address, country code, phone number, email, any information about you which you provide to us in registration forms, application forms or any other similar forms. HOTTAB shall not collect any Personal Data under any circumstance unless such the information is voluntary provided by you. By providing such information, you declare that you understand and acknowledge the purposes for which such information shall be used by us and that you consent to the usage of such information by us.
PRIVACY.Para7: The provision of your Personal Data is voluntary. When visiting the Website or using the Application, you can choose not to provide the Personal Data, however, we shall not be able to process Personal Data for the Purposes outlined below and may cause HOTTAB to be unable to provide services or accept payments from you.
PRIVACY.Para8: We shall not license, sell, rent or trade any collected data about your account or any other Personal Data unless you request it, the information is provided to help complete a transaction initiated by you, or the disclosure is otherwise lawfully permitted or requested.
PRIVACY.Para10: When using the Website or the Application, you also provide information to HOTTAB based on your access history relating to where you go and what you do at each site. This information is collected through web server logs and cookies and other similar technologies that allow us to track the aggregated statistics and data from our visitors as they utilize our Website.
PRIVACY.Para12: We use cookies to collect information such as: access history, consumer's choices when accessing and using Applications or the Website... to help HOTTAB understand the needs and preferences of Consumers and to be able to provide better services. If you reject cookies, you may still use the Website, but your ability to use some areas of our Website will be limited.
PRIVACY.Para14: HOTTAB shall collects the Data for the following purposes:
PRIVACY.Para15: To process your participation in any promotions, surveys;
PRIVACY.Para16: To process, manage or verify your application for subscription with HOTTAB and to provide you the benefits offered to subscribers;
PRIVACY.Para17: To validate your bookings and process payments relating to any products or services you have requested;
PRIVACY.Para18: To use Cookies to enhance our processes, advertising, notifications and security;
PRIVACY.Para19: At your acceptance, to share the Personal Data with certain merchants so that they can provide you with any services you have requested;
PRIVACY.Para20: To respond to your questions and concerns;
PRIVACY.Para21: For internal administrative purposes, such as auditing, data analysis, database records;
PRIVACY.Para22: For purposes of detection, prevention and prosecution of crime;
PRIVACY.Para23: To operate, maintain and improve our Website and Application;
PRIVACY.Para24: To send you support and administrative messages, technical notices, updates, security alerts;
PRIVACY.Para25: To investigate and prevent fraudulent transactions, unauthorized access to our Services, and other illegal activities.
PRIVACY.Para26: For other purposes, we shall ask for your permission in advance.
PRIVACY.Para28: Information about our consumers is an important part of our business, and we are not in the business of selling it to others. We share consumer information only for Purpose as described above and with merchants providing goods/services on the Website/Application.
PRIVACY.Para29: We may also disclose the Data as required by law, such as required in a legal process when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others investigate fraud, or respond to a government request if HOTTAB is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of its assets, you will be notified via email and/or a prominent notice on the Website and the Application of any change in ownership or uses of your Personal Data, as well as any choices you may have regarding your Personal Data to any other third party with your prior consent to do so.
PRIVACY.Para30: 5. Control and access to your Personal Data
PRIVACY.Para31: You may access, change, or correct your information by logging into your account at any time or by making a request to us, in which case we will need to verify your identity before granting access or changing or correcting your information, unless we find some conflicts or receive a report of your account or any problems related to technical or legal matters.
PRIVACY.Para33: The security of your Personal Data is important to us. We follow generally accepted standards to protect the Personal Data submitted to us, both during transmission and once we receive it.
PRIVACY.Para34: HOTTAB shall store all your Data in the host computer of HOTTAB. The data relating to your non-personal data shall be kept for 03 years from the date of back up, and the personal data shall be stored in the host computer of HOTTAB for an indefinite term.
PRIVACY.Para36: This Policy is effective as of June 29, 2018 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future, which will be in effect immediately after being posted on this page.
PRIVACY.Para37: We reserve the right to update or change our Policy at any time and you should check this Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Application and/or the Website or after we post any modifications to the Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified the Policy.
PRIVACY.Para38: If we make any material changes to the Policy, we will notify you either through the email address you have provided us, or by placing a prominent notice on  the Application and the Website.
PRIVACY.Para40: If you have any questions or concerns about this Policy or its implementation, please do not hesitate to contact us via Feedback function shown on the Website and the Application, or address: M16, M Floor, Hanoi Hotel, Hanoi. We will be more than happy to assist.

MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para1: This Privacy Policy (the "Policy") describes how Hottab Vietnam Company Limited ("HOTTAB", "us", "we", or "our") collects, uses, discloses and protects your Data as defined below. Please read this Policy and understand it before using our Website/Application. By signing up the Website: https://dashboard.hottab.co (the "Website") and/or using HOTTAB's Mobile application for consumers (the "Application"), which are supplied by HOTTAB or dealing with a merchant using the Application, you are agreeing to the terms of this Policy and Terms of Use which is also posted on the Website.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para3: This Policy applies to everyone who signs up the Website or uses the Application and does not apply to any third-party websites, services or applications, even if they are accessible through the Website. You linking to a third-party website, service or application is entirely at your own risk and subject to the terms and conditions of such website, service or application.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para4: 2. Collection of the Personal and Non-personal Data ("Data")
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para6: "Personal Data" means any information that can be used to contact or identify you, including but not limited to name, address, country code, phone number, email, any information about you which you provide to us in registration forms, application forms or any other similar forms. HOTTAB shall not collect any Personal Data under any circumstance unless such the information is voluntary provided by you. By providing such information, you declare that you understand and acknowledge the purposes for which such information shall be used by us and that you consent to the usage of such information by us.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para7: Provision some of your Personal Data is mandatory for using the Application/registration of an account and failure to provide your Personal Data may cause HOTTAB to be unable to engage you to provide services or products or issue payments to you for products or services provided.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para8: We shall not license, sell, rent or trade any collected data about your account or any other Personal Data unless you request it, the information is provided to help complete a transaction initiated by you, or the disclosure is otherwise lawfully permitted or requested.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para10: When signing up the Website and/or using the Application, you also provide information to HOTTAB other than Personal Data based on your business activities through the Website and/or the Application including but not limited to transaction, receipt, accountant, labor information, business secrets.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para12: We use cookies on the Website and Application. If you reject cookies, you may still use the Website and/or Application, but your ability to use some areas of our Website and/or Application will be limited.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para14: HOTTAB shall collects the Data for the following purposes:
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para15: For the purposes of engaging you to provide services or products;
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para16: To enable any checks as may be required by HOTTAB in order to engage you;
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para17: To process payments relating to any products or services you have provided;
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para18: To contact you in relation to the provision of your services.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para19: To respond to your questions and concerns;
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para20: For internal administrative purposes, such as auditing, data analysis, database records;
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para21: For purposes of detection, prevention and prosecution of crime;
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para22: To operate, maintain and improve our Website and Application;
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para23: To send you support and administrative messages, technical notices, updates, security alerts;
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para24: To investigate and prevent fraudulent transactions, unauthorized access to our Services, and other illegal activities.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para26: For other purposes, we shall ask for your permission in advance.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para28: Information about you is an important part of our business, and we are not in the business of selling it to others. We share information only for the Purpose as described above or unless otherwise provided by law.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para29: We may also disclose your Personal Data as required by law, such as required in a legal process when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request. If HOTTAB is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of its assets, you will be notified via email and/or a prominent notice on the Website and the Application of any change in ownership or uses of your Personal Data, as well as any choices you may have regarding your Personal Data to any other third party with your prior consent to do so.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para30: 5. Control and access to your Personal Data
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para31: You may access, change, or correct your information by logging into your account at any time or by making a request to us, in which case we will need to verify your identity before granting access or changing or correcting your information, unless we find some conflicts or receive a report of your account or any problems related to technical or legal matters.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para33: The security of your Personal Data is important to us. In order to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure or other similar risks, we follow generally accepted standards to protect the Personal Data submitted to us, both during transmission and once we receive it. HOTTAB shall store all your Data in the host computer of HOTTAB. The data shall be automatically backed up daily at [...] a.m/ p.m. The data relating to your non-personal data shall be kept for 03 years from the date of back up, and the personal data shall be stored in the host computer of HOTTAB for an indefinite term.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para36: This Policy is effective as of June 29, 2018 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future, which will be in effect immediately after being posted on this page.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para37: We reserve the right to update or change our Policy at any time and you should check this Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Application and/or the Website or after we post any modifications to the Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified the Policy.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para38: If we make any material changes to the Policy, we will notify you either through the email address you have provided us, or by placing a prominent notice on  the Application and the Website.
MERCHANT_PRIVACY_POLICY.Para40: If you have any questions or concerns about this Policy or its implementation, please do not hesitate to contact us via Feedback function shown on the Website and the Application, or address: M16, M Floor, Hanoi Hotel, Hanoi. We will be more than happy to assist.

TERM_AND_CONDITION.Para11: By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you have the right, authority and capacity to use the Service and to abide by the Terms and Conditions. When using the Service you agree to comply with all applicable laws whether in your home nation or otherwise in the country, state and city in which you are present while using the Service (the “Alternate Country”).
TERM_AND_CONDITION.Para12: You may only access the Service using authorized means. HOTTAB is not liable if you do not have a compatible device or if you have downloaded the wrong or incompatible version of the Application to your device. MERCHANT_TERM_AND_CONDITION.Para90: For the avoidance of doubt, the termination of this Agreement shall not require HOTTAB to compensate, reimburse or cover any cost incurred by you, including but not limited to the credit reserved with HOTTAB or any other monies paid to HOTTAB in the course of performing your obligations under this Agreement.
